summary: Constructs of the old brought are now available for player usage (REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC).
descriptionHtml:
[b]What is this?[/b]
This mod aims to simple allow players to create deployable dwemer constructs using the Dwarven Smithing perk in an aim to provide the player the ability to lead a small group of Dwemer constructs through Skyrim.

[b]What does it add/change?[/b]
- Craftable dwemer spider,sphere, and ballista.
- Modified Dwemer perk and a new perk for smithing called \"Dwemer Scholar\" which allows extended  construct capacity
- Markarth Court Wizard and blacksmith shop list.

[b]What do I need?[/b]
- Skyrim
- Dragonborn DLC
- Nexus Mod Manager
- Brains

[b]Changelog:[/b]
v.0.01 - Mod Release

[b]Future Plans:[/b]
- Centurions to be added
- NPC usage list
- Lootlist modifications
- Further Dwemer tech integration

[b]Instructions on how to obtain the constructs[/b]
Spider Construct - Requires you to have Dwarven Smithing perk under Dwarven category. (Will require minimum materials to produce 1 unit with a duration of 1 day service.) Requires ancient knowledge to produce

Sphere Construct - Requires you to have Dwarven Smithing perk under Dwarven category. (Will require moderate materials to produce 1 unit with duration of 1 day service.) Requires ancient knowledge and Dwarven Scholar perk to produce.

Ballista Construct - Requires to have Dwarven Smithing perk under Dwarven category. (Will require most materials to produce 1 unit with 1 day of service.) Requires ancient knowledge perk to produce.


[b]Installation[/b]
1.) Simply download the file.
2.) Make sure the file is not corrupt and no mods will conflict with this mod. (See compatability section)
3.) Install through Nexus Mod Manager.
4.) Rerun BOSS just incase.

[b]Uninstall[/b]
1.) Make sure you dont have any active constructs. (24 ingame hours to wait for them to unspawn.)
2.) Uninstall through Nexus Mod Manager.

[b]Compatability[/b]
- This may conflict with anything that changes the Smithing Perk tree
- Possible Conflict with changes to merchant container list for Markarth Court Wizard and castle smith.
- This is script free so it has a pretty safe uninstall/install ability.

[b]Bugs & Issues[/b]
- Theres some issues when trying to summon the constructs on some terrain. (They wont spawn at all.)
author: Icefrenzy
